views.markdown:
-Fixed a connection problem in BTstack GPS

-Fix bug in handling of "Force Off" from Settings

- Fixed race condition in BTstack startup

- Fix a connection problem for incoming connections
- Simpler Preferences UI
Fix more connection problems Support for ARM64 devices Provide symlinks to match older version
Fixes compatibility with gpSPhone
Fixes hard-coded Bluetooth Address (regression) Fix accidentally broken Settings on iOS 3 and 4 Fix for iOS 6 * FASTER: 3 mbps communication speed to Bluetooth Module on newer devices with iOS 4+ (was 930 kbps)
* Better Logging
* Logging enabled in Settings.app
* Log output added to packet log in /tmp/hci_dump.pklg
* Bug fixes:
* Prevent stalling when BTstack was open in Settings.app
* Don't close RFCOMM channel of other apps
* Don't trash link & remote device db on SIGINT
* More: see BTstack on Googlecode
* Supports low-power mode during device sleep
* New RFCOMM & L2CAP state machines
* Less bugs

    v 0.3-1170
  • Added BTstack Settings: Allows to switch between Off, Apple's Bluetooth and BTstack off
    v 0.3-434
  • developer API additions
    v 0.2-1045
  • Retina icons!
  • limit size of /tmp/hci_dump.pklg to 1000 packets (max 1 MB)
  • set SpringBoard icon after respring if active
  • power handling: handle power changes in all states, receive and handle power notifications, keep track of individual clients
  • automate scan enable management: hci_set_discoverable(bool) sets inquiry scan, page scan is always active
  • fixed bugs in cocoa run loop implementation
  • removed link key and name caching from BTstackManager, honor BTSTACK_EVENT_ REMOTE_NAME_CACHED
    v 0.2-975
  • Fix for regression bug in 0.2-899 that prevented automatic disabling of Apple Bluetooth stack, less crashes
  • Startup: send kill signal to BlueTool and BTServer, if necessary
  • Connection setup: don't close baseband during authentication
  • Remote Device DB: automatic link key handling in BTdaemon, provide cached remote names during inquiry
  • SDP: use 1000 bytes MTU, fix partial responses, fix an incompatibility with Windows native statck
  • Cocoa run_loop: added timeouts, include in libBTstack.dylib build
    v 0.2-899
  • less bugs/crashes
  • faster: 920 kbps UART speed (was: 230 kbps)
  • bigger: internal packet buffers are 1021 bytes for 3-DH5 packets
  • better:
  • sets Bluetooth device name to hostname
  • automatic ACL flowcontrol to prevent Bluetooth controller overflow
  • optional L2CAP credit-based flow control
  • MTU for L2CAP channels and services
    v 0.2-757
  • New SDP Server
  • Fixes to L2CAP protocol
  • Might work on iOS 4.0 ;)
    v 0.1-585
  • fix incoming l2cap connections
  • fix crash of daemon on app exit
  • allow for master/slave role change.
    v 0.1-642
  • BTstack can disable Apple BT on iPad, too.
  • Made Apple BT work after using BTstack
  • Supports L2CAP Information Request Signaling Command
  • Increase BT communication speed from 115200 to 230400
